spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe misalignment. Kitchen moved to the right wall instead of the top-left corner. The bathroom is completely missing walls, with fixtures placed out in the open. Staircase orientation is incorrect.

structural_fidelity.notes: Failed to include internal partition walls for the bathroom. Missing external doors and windows defined in the plan. Hallucinated a large central staircase cavity that does not match the floor plan's footprint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen appliances are present but misplaced. Bathroom fixtures (toilet/sink) are hallucinated as open-plan furniture rather than enclosed in a room.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High visual quality. Correct isometric camera angle, clean geometry, and consistent lighting/color palette despite structural inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Missing bathroom partition walls and multiple external windows/doors.
Kitchen elements moved from North/West walls to East wall.
Staircase orientation and layout do not match the U-shaped design in the floor plan.
The scale of the staircase is oversized relative to the living area.
Hallucinated open-air bathroom fixtures and extra furniture pieces not in plan.
